short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple way to preview webpages.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Sumit is a simple extension which allows you to preview websites. Hover over a link for a second and a summary of the page will appear.

Click on the Sumit icon and follow the hyperlink to set up the app!

This app is currently in beta and a few features are in development. As such, feel free to leave issues/ suggestions on the GitHub repo.
